Description:
Build your dream home close town
Wonderful opportunity to acquire an acre of land within walking distance to the centre of town. Bordered by maturing trees there is a sense of privacy.
There are establishing trees planted throughout so you don't have to wait years & a clear area to build your dream home of how many squares you like.
A two minute drive & you are at Christian College, Drysdale Primary School, in the third minute your are shopping at Coles, Aldi or Safeway.
Easy drive to Portarlington with no traffic lights to catch the Port Phillip Ferry to Melbourne Docklands.
Local restaurant wineries like Jack Rabbit, Terindah & Bellarine Estate are just minutes drive down the road.
This is an exciting opportunity to establish yourself on the Bellarine Peninsula in the central hub of Drysdale.

Description:
Position Perfect
The Bellarine Peninsula has seen a large increase in Private & Public investment in infrastructure and business, translating to solid growth and investment opportunities in Drysdale. Here is that exact opportunity; a perfectly positioned home with quick access to the High Street shops, shopping centre, schools, public transport, medical facilities and dining, comprising 3 bedrooms, central bathroom, spacious living area, central kitchen & dining area and a large secure yard. The home has new carpets, reverse cycle heating/cooling & gas heating coupled with ample off street parking, garage, secure yard and a solid rental history. Perfect!

Description:
The Perfect Start On 476m2
The perfect place to start within this established pocket, a 14m frontage by 34m deep makes up this generous 476m2 approx block.
Opportunity to build your dream family abode (STCA), offering great scope for North facing aspects, a moments walking distance to the supermarket, main shopping strip, cafes and eateries, even the local Drysdale pub.
With convenience on offer, easy access to some of the best surf coast beaches on the peninsula and only a short 30 minute drive to Geelong, this slice of paradise won't last long.

Description:
RENOVATED , SOLAR , LEAFY ASPECT 669 SQM......DRYSDALE DELIGHT!
No. 7 is a perfect residence, move in , unpack and enjoy this private haven. Lounge room has room to dine and live , new kitchen with adjacent meals or second smaller living with doors opening to outdoor patio. Three bedrooms, two with BIR'S, the third is a single bedroom or study. Central bathroom, large laundry and separate toilet. Features include gas heater, airconditioner, fans, 2 x water tanks ( app. 5500 litres) and more. The matured garden frames this perfect home, leafy with fruit trees as well. Side access through to large carport and garage. Walk to the village, schools, parklands and all amenities. Ring me to inspect , you will be impressed.

Description:
Privacy and Quiet in the Heart of Drysdale
Tucked away at the end of a driveway between two houses, this very private, neat brick home boasts a surprising amount of accommodation. Four bedrooms are on offer - the master has a northern view of the front garden with its boxed hedges, plus a walk-through wardrobe which leads to the two-way bathroom with shower, vanity and bath - and a separate WC. A central passage leads to a large open-plan kitchen/dining/lounge with lovely views of the well-kept rear garden. The kitchen has a generous working space with a return serving bench, an electric oven and 4-burner gas cooktop, a stainless-steel dishwasher, and pantry. The room is well-catered for in terms of heating and cooling, with a split-system as well as a large gas wall heater. Outdoor barbecues and dining are appealing options, with access to the delightful rear garden through a sliding door from the lounge. A simple set-up with table, chairs and an umbrella and you’re enjoying relaxed, private alfresco entertainment. There’s also room to park a couple of cars at the front of the house. Well located in a quiet Drysdale street and within easy walking distance to the town’s main retail hub, this compact family home also benefits from central access by car to all of the attractions and destinations on the fabulous Bellarine Peninsula.
Insights: 15A Elgin Street, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
Central Charm!
This delightful fully renovated 2 bedroom unit is without doubt one of Drysdale's finest.
From its unrivalled central location the property is literally a short walk to all of Drysdale's local amenities; various cafes and supermarkets, community centres and comprehensive medical service providers.
The charm and character of towering cathedral ceilings, exposed brick internal walls and hardwood polished floor boards are complimented by a crisp light n bright renovation.
A full renovation is no exaggeration as no stone have been unturned. A brand new kitchen is complete with new appliances and a stainless steel range hood. The bathroom follows suit and has has had an impressive transformation. A wonderfully private court yard boasts an expansive timber bench seat a great area for a BBQ.
A beautiful tree lined streetscape within a tightly held pocket of Drysdale completes a very pretty picture.
Insights: 3/38-40 Princess Street, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 9 other 2 bedroom unit in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
A Storybook Lifestyle on 4922m2 (approx)
Perfectly orientated on 4922m2 (approx), harnessing northern aspects and stunningly orchestrated garden outlooks, this property of privileged proportions is guaranteed to impress. With a breathtaking natural ambiance, timeless design is fused with modern conveniences and sun-filled living zones to create a welcoming and simply beautiful family home. If you’ve been dreaming of the perfect tree-change with coastal benefits close by, please step this way!
-Set at the end of quiet court on over an acre of picturesque, immaculately landscaped grounds
-Sunny northern aspects are enjoyed from the OP kitchen, living and meals area, with inviting garden views
-The recently upgraded luxury kitchen boasts Miele/Siemens apps, stone benchtops and polished finishes
-This light filled space is a welcoming heart to the home, perfect for family gatherings of epic proportions
-Direct access to the sun infused outdoor patio with established trees providing organic privacy
-A separate parents wing enjoys solitude from the busy nucleus, with commodious BIRs and ensuite
-Formal living zones share this wing, providing dual living options for growing families and visitors alike
-Minor BRs are linked by a central hallway, housing the luxury of walk in robes and beautiful garden aspects
-The rear patio area is the ideal setting to escape the summer heat and relax with mother nature
-Storage is paramount throughout the entire home, with every zone boasting a commodious supply
-Decorated in muted tones and quality fixtures/fittings, a classically elegant palette provides a calming interior
-Seasonal comfort is prioritised with ducted heating/cooling, R/C air conditioning, a wood fire and gas log fire
-Triple access to the remote DLUG adds convenience, with a further oversized shed for equipment/vehicle overflow
-Rural Australian gardens are fully irrigated, attracting an over abundance of chorusing native bird life
-Practical facilities are close by, with both Drysdale and Clifton Springs townships within a short distance
- A stone’s throw from Port Phillip Bay and the Clifton Springs Golf Club for water and sporting enthusiasts
-Spend your Sundays exploring the award winning wineries and restaurants this part of the Bellarine is renowned for
A complete lifestyle is on offer here - why settle for anything less?
Insights: 24-26 Cemetery Road, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
One of the best locations
In secluded Vron Place with easy pedestrian access to Barrands Lane for walking to the shopping centre, local cafes, Drysdale Primary School, Christian College.
The large four bedroom plus study home has a distinctly peaceful country feel from the front fence to the kitchen, bathroom & laundry.
A wide welcoming hallway greats you as you arrive home.
The open plan casual living area opens up to reveal a modern kitchen with breakfast bar, casual carpeted lounge & tiled dining.
Sliding doors offer access to the private covered outdoor entertaining is excellent for all year round BBQ's & spacious backyard. With 712 sqm approx. of land there is a feeling of space & the trees create a tranquil setting just minutes walk to the shops.
The separate theatre/ lounge room could be easily partioned off to create a private retreat.
The master bedroom easily fits a kingsize bed, roomy ensuite & walk in robe.
The study is generous & could be a fifth bedroom / guest room.
A separate passage services the other three bedrooms all with built n robes.
The central bathroom is stylish & modern.
The laundry leads off the kitchen & doubles up as an extra freezer locaton.
The wide driveway gives excellent access to the double garage and the single stand alone 'Boat Shed". There is drive through access to the entertaining area.
Insights: 35 other 4 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
A Low-Maintenance Gem in Charming Drysdale!
Tucked away in a peaceful and convenient locale, here's your chance to embrace low-maintenance living with all of the perks! Less than two years young and boasting its own title, ( No Body Corporate fees ) this property presents a terrific opportunity for downsizers, investors, and first homebuyers alike.
A carefree lifestyle awaits with the bustling hub of Drysdale just a heartbeat away. With cafes, restaurants, shops, and supermarkets just a leisurely stroll from home, your fast-paced city life will soon be a distant memory. A selection of primary and high schools are within easy reach, while public transport is just footsteps away. Spend your weekends working up a sweat at the nearby Drysdale Recreation Reserve, treating yourself at one of the region's many wineries, or exploring the stunning surrounding coastline.
White walls and floor tiles create a contemporary colour palette, which invites you to add a splash of your favourite colour to truly make this home your own.
The open plan living zone creates a lovely space for both relaxing and entertaining. Opening onto the private and landscaped alfresco, you'll love inviting family and friends over for a casual barbeque or drinks under the sun. The all-white kitchen is a picture of good taste and features a built-in pantry, ample storage, and Westinghouse stainless steel appliances (oven, gas hob, rangehood, and dishwasher).
The Master Bedroom boasts a walk-in robe that leads to the tidy en suite with large semi-frameless shower. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the main bathroom, which is complete with a semi-frameless shower and deep bathtub. The laundry is equipped with storage and external access.
Ducted heating, evaporative cooling, and ceiling fans keep you comfortable in all seasons.
The remote double lock-up garage features internal access, while the long driveway provides additional off-street parking. Security shutters on all bedroom windows offer a sense of security.
Easy care gardens (including artificial turf), veggie patches, approx. 3000L water tank, and a garden shed add the final touches to this low-maintenance gem.
With so much on offer, you'll need to act swiftly to avoid disappointment! Inspect without delay!
Insights: 22 other 3 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
Private Townhouse in Central Drysdale
This 3 bedroom townhouse is conveniently located within easy walking distance of the local shops, cafes, parklands and bus stop. Drysdale is the heart of the Bellarine Peninsula and is surrounded by world class winerys, golf courses, restaurants, bay and ocean beaches. Beautifully presented with an updated kitchen, new ensuite, new bathroom, private covered courtyard, and single garage. Open plan lounge and dining area, timber topped kitchen with new gas and electric cooking appliances. Ducted gas heating and air conditioning make for all year round comfort. plenty of storage. Great retirement or long term investment.

Description:
As New and Ready For You
This stunning family home offers all the space your growing family needs, conveniently located a short 5 minute walk from Drysdale's flourishing town centre. Upon entering, you are greeted by a light and bright hallway, with the master bedroom, modern ensuite and WIR privately located on your right. The passageway continues down past the formal lounge room and then opens up into a spacious kitchen/living/dining area, acting as the hub of the home. The living/dining opens up into a generous backyard, with an undercover outdoor entertaining area perfect for all year round enjoyment! The remaining three bedrooms all feature BIRs and have access to a central bathroom and separate toilet. Central heating, double remote garage and plenty of off street parking complete this package. Properties in the Central Walk Estate do not last long, contact us to book your inspection today!

Description:
The Drysdale Gem!
The Facts (In Short):.
-A+++ central location; right in the heart of one of Drysdale's most tightly held neighbourhoods
-A charming custom build boasting a true one of a kind floor plan; believe it or not but this gem of a property boasts x3 defined living areas in addition to x2 generous bedrooms (master is complete with a walk in robe and walk through bathroom)
-A beautifully light and bright experience; numerous full span windows provide lovely filtered light and perfectly frame beautifully landscaped gardens and various private courtyards.
-A corner allotment; double remote controlled garage with drive through capacity
The Features:
Brace yourself for undoubtedly one of the finest inspections 'for the downsizer' in the property market. A genuine one of kind that simply ticks all the boxes!! An A+++ location literally places you right in the heart of Drysdale and access to all the local amenities. A charming and clever build has thought of everything; generous proportions and light filled rooms are consistent theme throughout. A well appointed kitchen is complete with quality fittings and excellent storage solutions; a walk in pantry further endorses a user friendly design. Glass sliding doors of the meals area create a seamless connection to a beautifully private courtyard; a northerly orientation ensures it is a lovely spot for an early morning coffee. A true one of a kind floor plan is only limited by ones imagination; 3 defined living areas offer a plethora of options and living arrangements. Beautiful landscaped gardens and your choice of various courtyards complete a very pretty picture.
Insights: 16 Nash Avenue, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 10 other 2 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
AUCTION TODAY @ 12:00 HAYESWINCKLE DRYSDALE
Prime Location, Prime Block of Land- Imagine the possibilities!! This property lends itself to so many avenues of opportunities such as the potential of running a business (STCA & zoning) being right in the heart of the Drysdale Township, subdivision potential (STCA) or you may be simply looking for a property that is walking distance to all your amenities, whatever your motivation maybe the time is now to snap up an opportunity that is often sought but rarely found. Comprising 3 bedrooms all with built-in robes, 1 bathroom with shower and toilet, living area including gas wall heater, kitchen with gas cooking and dishwasher, dining, separate toilet & laundry; outside greets you with an expansive undercover area, outdoor office, garage + workshop & a huge 7x3 recreational room surrounded by established plants, trees, flowers & vegetable patches.
Features of the home include ducted heating, split system heating and cooling x 2, gas wall heater, ceiling fans, exterior block out awnings on the living room and bedroom windows all set out on timber floor boards with a very private south east facing front yard.
This neat & tidy brick home is in good condition & with enough TLC you could really recreate & definitely improve what the outside facilities have to offer. Located in the hub of all your amenities with the luxury of waking up and smelling the coffee each morning, the home can be changed but location is forever.
Insights: 22 other 3 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
Martindale - A Bellarine Lifestyle
Set amongst established rural, lifestyle properties on the outskirts of Drysdale. This property is quietly tucked away, off the main roads. Just enough land to partake of all the activities that a change of lifestyle will involve - established pastures for livestock, raised vegetable beds for ease of planting and harvesting and an established orchard with a variety of trees.
The icing on the cake is the modern, impeccably maintained home of spacious proportions. Constructed of sandstone-coloured blocks with wide verandas the internal open plan living areas frame views of the rural landscape from nearly every window. Three roomy bedrooms all have WIRs, the main bedroom also includes a dressing room or study nook / home office. Spacious work areas in the kitchen include a WIP and throughout the home storage is at a premium. There is the option of multiple living areas to suit the purchaser's needs.
An additional enclosed entertaining area of 52m2 adds a further dimension to this sought after property. This outstanding addition is fully enclosed by glass sliding doors with screens and includes a pellet combustion heater, wood-fired oven and ceiling fans.
Storage areas abound and include DLUG 6m x 7m x 3m , 2 car carport, 6m x 15m workshop with concrete floor, 6m x 6m open bay shed with concrete floor. Town water connection and storage capacity for 20,000 litres of tank water.
Insights: 122-130 Martins Road, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Private Setting on 1/3 Acre
This 4-bedroom home is located in one of Drysdale's best streets. It adjoins the Bellerine Rail Trail and has easy walking access to local schools, parks, lakes and playgrounds. Drysdale is the heart of the Bellerine Peninsula and is surrounded by golf courses, beaches, boat ramps, world class wineries, cafes and restaurants. The house contains a sunny north facing lounge and dining area, plus separate family room and separate rumpus room. Updated kitchen, full ensuite, study, and 6m x 8 m covered outdoor dining area. Ducted heating and cooling. Outside is a double garage, plus another 10m x 7m rear shed for tools or toys. Water tank, garden sprinkler system and 2kw solar system makes life easier. Beautifully treed block with room to breathe. Inspection by Appointment.
Insights: 22 Station Street, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
A Rare Find!
The Facts:
-A charming and wonderfully spacious 3 bedroom home with an A+ central location
-A truly warm and welcoming property; high ceilings, lead light windows, decorative cornice and many more features create a 'homely' feel.
-3 Defined living areas; formal lounge, expansive kitchen/meals zone and a further casual lounge is bathed in natural light with glass sliding doors to a north facing alfresco.
-A home of generous proportions with all the modern comforts and great storage solutions.
-Double remote garage with rear drive through access (2.4m rear roller door)
The Features:
Warm, welcoming and charming is what you will be greeted by as you turn the key at 121 Barrands Lane, Drysdale. Lovely high ceilings with decorative cornices, light filled rooms and a selection of stunning lead light windows and light fittings create a 'homely' feel. A well-appointed timber kitchen offers a practical design and excellent storage solutions. The master bedroom is complete with an ensuite and walk in robe; the 2nd bedroom would be the envy of a number of master suites in the market place and the 3rd bedroom is generous and offers built in robes. A full sized family bathroom and a good old fashioned laundry (with floor to ceiling storage) showcase a floor plan that delivers on the brief of truly 'user friendly' design. A north facing alfresco zone is finished with decorative pressed concrete and offers a lovely space to admire your spacious rear yard and various productive fruit trees. The A+ central location of this property cannot be understated as it places you right in the heart of Drysdale; only a short walk to various cafes, supermarkets, community centres and a number of medical services.
Insights: 121 Barrands Lane, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 22 other 3 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
Dress Circle Drysdale
This exceptional, rare lifestyle property is a brilliant family home set in the semi rural surrounds of Drysdale. Positioned over approx. 4 acres, this brick, 6 bedroom plus study residence features views across Corio Bay, large living spaces, a pool, a garden with established fruit trees and playground
This immaculately kept home has recently been refurbished having had new carpets installed and the slate flooring resealed. The open plan family room and kitchen is a convivial space that expands for entertaining to include the timber deck through bi-fold doors. A large pantry and great storage are highlights of this social kitchen that is fitted with stainless steel appliances and plenty of bench space. The dining room has plenty of space for a large table and features built in cabinetry and the split level lounge captures the northern sun and is big enough for the whole family to sit by the open wood fireplace and take in the bay views.
Everyone gets their own space here with well appointed bedrooms, fitted with slim line heaters, fans and BIRs. Carpeted stairs lead to a secluded bedroom with views onto mature trees and a pretty vista across the bay. Bathrooms are well appointed and the Master ensuite features dual vanity with stone bench tops, double shower, good storage and separate toilet. A versatile house - chose your bedrooms and use the others as rumpus/retreat/art/music/sewing room etc. A separate WC off the boot room adds convenience and easy access to the garden.
Nestled on a private allotment that borders both Reserve and Andersons Roads, this home is walking distance to schools and parkland and is located opposite the Drysdale Pony Club. Just minutes to the Drysdale shopping centre, Curlewis golf club and a short drive to Geelong, this private home is in impeccable condition and has potential to be fenced into paddocks to create the ultimate lifestyle property.
- Rare lifestyle opportunity in semi rural location, close to amenities
- Brick residence with 6 bedrooms & 2 bathrooms and large laundry
- Open plan kitchen family room open to timber deck overlooking pool
- Home has been impeccably maintained recently repainted
- Large living spaces and plenty of space would suit families
- A dream home for entertaining
Insights: 98-108 Reserve Road, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Grand Design
The grand entrance invites you into this amazing property that has been designed to flow from internal to external living spaces around the heart of the home - The Kitchen. With stone benches, 900mm oven, butlers pantry and gas cooking, the open plan kitchen meals & family room uses the east facing alfresco living and deck to double the entertaining space in summer and access the 892 sqm block of land, whilst the rumpus room is perfect for the pool table and alike on the wintery days. The master suite comes with his & hers WIR, his and hers vanity, huge spa bath and large shower, with the further 3 bedrooms having their own central bathroom with bedroom 2 enjoying direct access as an ensuite - perfect for extended family living. Car accommodation consists of a double garage under roofline and a further tandem garage (half converted into a Man Cave with a fire and toilet) and plenty of off street parking. Perfect for those looking for some space whilst having the conveniences of Drysdale living, reserve land, Bellarine rail trail and the waterholes all within a short stroll of this central position.

Description:
All the Hard Work is DONE!
Why build when you can purchase this near new complete package! Offering comfort and convenience along with a free flowing floor plan and well throughout design, this 18 month young home will be sure to impress.
The fore of the home consists of the master bedroom with walk-in robe that has been decked out with shelves and drawers, full ensuite including stone bench top and seamless tiled base. The hub of the home is the open plan kitchen meals and dining which lead to the undercover outdoor area. The kitchen is complete with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and microwave and 900mm gas cooking. This astute design has the remaining 3 bedrooms all with built-in robes tucked away with the 2nd living area which makes for a fantastic play area or movie room, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry.
Features include, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, stainless steel appliances, stone bench tops in the bathrooms/kitchen, decked out robes, wide hall way, high ceilings, linen press + broom cupboard, NBN, double lock up garage with remote access and internal entry, large garden shed, low maintenance gardens with side access.
Located in the ever popular Central Walks Estate located approx. 1km to the main township of Drysdale where you are flanked for choice for all your amenities; also a short drive to Portarlington, St Leonards and the Geelong CBD. Situated on 481m2, why go through the hassle of building when all the hard work has been done!

Description:
Expansive Family Home With Huge Triple Garage - On A Landscaped 2 Acres!
Phone Enquiry ID:44440
An expansive family home on a superb, beautifully landscaped 2 acres (8000sqm) right in the heart of Drysdale, perfect for families of any configuration and throughout all stages of life. Just moments from all amenities, yet surrounded by other small acreages with plenty of space in between.
This beautiful, quality-built home is immaculately presented with a long list of features. An exceptional opportunity to acquire an expansive, premium home along with the relaxed, carefree country-meets-surf-coast lifestyle that only the Bellarine Peninsula can offer!
If you’ve given up hope that you’ll ever find a small, centrally located acreage with a ready-made home that can accommodate all the cars, the weekend toys and your tools, as well as enough internal living space to complement, you may have to sit down…. The home and lifestyle you’re looking for actually does exist!
Four large bedrooms, or three plus an office and two bathrooms - impressive Master suite with walk-in robe and ensuite. A beautiful timber kitchen at the heart, surrounded by extra-large formal and informal living and dining zones with north-facing windows allowing abundant natural light to trickle in.
A wide veranda skirts around three sides with beautiful rural outlooks over the gardens to the paddocks behind - and the handyman, car or watersport enthusiast will love the huge 10m x 8m triple rautomatic garage and workshop!
The location is paramount, to say the very least. Just 1km to Drysdale PO, within minutes from an array of quality schooling options, 10 minutes (10km) to Ocean Grove and Point Lonsdale’s surf beaches, 20km to Central Geelong, 15 mins to historic Queenscliff and Queenscliff-Mornington ferry.
Perhaps best of all, Melbourne professionals can say goodbye to their 2-3 hour heavy-traffic commute, and say hello to a relaxed, 12 minute country drive to the Port Phillip Ferry terminal; where they can either enjoy the glorious bay views - instead of tail lights; catch up on the latest news or get a headstart on the day’s workload!
FEATURES:
- Gas ducted heating throughout
- Split system air-conditioning
- Back-to-base security system
- 20,000ltr water tank (and connected to town water)
- Immaculately looked after, quality-built home
